verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year שָׁל֔וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> sha-Loosh, In the third לְמַלְכ֖וּת <S%H4438><s%> le-mal-Chut of the reign יְהוֹיָקִ֣ים <S%H3079><s%> ye-ho-ya-Kim of Jehoiakim מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> ba came נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֧ר <S%H5019><s%> ne-vu-chad-netz-Tzar Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king בָּבֶ֛ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim unto Jerusalem וַיָּ֥צַר <S%H6696><s%> vai-Ya-tzar and besieged עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha. and

וַיִּתֵּן֩ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten gave אֲדֹנָ֨י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai And the Lord בְּיָד֜וֹ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do into his hand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוֹיָקִ֣ים <S%H3079><s%> ye-ho-ya-Kim Jehoiakim מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וּמִקְצָת֙ <S%H7117><s%> u-mik-Tzat with part כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lei of the vessels בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> veit- of the house הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God וַיְבִיאֵ֥ם <S%H935><s%> vay-vi-'Em which he carried אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> 'e-retz- into the land שִׁנְעָ֖ר <S%H8152><s%> shin-'Ar of Shinar בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit to the house אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hav; of his god וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַכֵּלִ֣ים <S%H3627><s%> hak-ke-Lim the vessels הֵבִ֔יא <S%H935><s%> he-Vi, and he brought בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house אוֹצַ֥ר <S%H214><s%> o-Tzar into the treasure אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hav. of his god

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer spake הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, And the king לְאַשְׁפְּנַ֖ז <S%H828><s%> le-'ash-pe-Naz unto Ashpenaz רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> rav the master סָרִיסָ֑יו <S%H5631><s%> sa-ri-Sav; of his eunuchs לְהָבִ֞יא <S%H935><s%> le-ha-Vi that he should bring מִבְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei [certain] of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וּמִזֶּ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> u-miz-Ze-ra' seed הַמְּלוּכָ֖ה <S%H4410><s%> ham-me-lu-Chah and of the king's וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- some הַֽפַּרְתְּמִֽים׃ <S%H6579><s%> Hap-par-te-Mim. and of the princes

יְלָדִ֣ים <S%H3206><s%> ye-la-Dim Children אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- else בָּהֶ֣ם ba-Hem כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every; מְאוּם me-'um כמוּם֩ <S%H3971><s%> Mum blemish קוְטוֹבֵ֨י <S%H2896><s%> ve-to-Vei but well מַרְאֶ֜ה <S%H4758><s%> mar-'Eh favoured וּמַשְׂכִּילִ֣ים <S%H7919><s%> u-mas-ki-Lim and skilful בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol every חָכְמָ֗ה <S%H2451><s%> choch-mah in all wisdom וְיֹ֤דְעֵי <S%H3045><s%> ve-Yo-de-'ei and cunning דַ֙עַת֙ <S%H1847><s%> da-'at in knowledge וּמְבִינֵ֣י <S%H995><s%> u-me-vi-Nei and understanding מַדָּ֔ע <S%H4093><s%> mad-Da', science וַאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher and who כֹּ֣חַ <S%H3581><s%> Ko-ach and such as [had] ability בָּהֶ֔ם <S%H99999><s%> ba-Hem, לַעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> la-'a-Mod in them to stand בְּהֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> be-hei-Chal palace הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech; in the king's וּֽלֲלַמְּדָ֥ם <S%H3925><s%> u-la-lam-me-Dam and whom they might teach סֵ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer the learning וּלְשׁ֥וֹן <S%H3956><s%> u-le-Shon and the tongue כַּשְׂדִּֽים׃ <S%H3778><s%> kas-Dim. of the Chaldeans

וַיְמַן֩ <S%H4487><s%> vay-Man appointed לָהֶ֨ם la-Hem הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech And the king דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- provision י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom A daily בְּיוֹמ֗וֹ <S%H3117><s%> be-yo-Mo, A daily מִפַּת־ mip-pat- בַּ֤ג <S%H6598><s%> bag meat הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech of the king's וּמִיֵּ֣ין <S%H3196><s%> u-mi-Yein and of the wine מִשְׁתָּ֔יו <S%H4960><s%> mish-Tav, which he drank וּֽלְגַדְּלָ֖ם <S%H1431><s%> u-le-gad-de-Lam so nourishing שָׁנִ֣ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim years שָׁל֑וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> sha-Loosh; them three וּמִ֨קְצָתָ֔ם <S%H7117><s%> u-Mik-tza-Tam, that at the end יַֽעַמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> ya-'am-Du thereof they might stand לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech. the king

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become בָהֶ֖ם va-Hem מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei Now among these were of the children יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah דָּנִיֵּ֣אל <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-Yel Daniel חֲנַנְיָ֔ה <S%H2608><s%> cha-nan-Yah, Hananiah מִֽישָׁאֵ֖ל <S%H4332><s%> mi-sha-'El Mishael וַעֲזַרְיָֽה׃ <S%H5838><s%> va-'a-zar-Yah. and Azariah

וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem gave לָהֶ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem Then שַׂ֥ר <S%H8269><s%> sar Unto whom the prince הַסָּרִיסִ֖ים <S%H5631><s%> has-sa-ri-Sim of the eunuchs שֵׁמ֑וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot; names וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem for he gave לְדָֽנִיֵּ֜אל <S%H1840><s%> le-da-ni-Yel unto Daniel בֵּ֣לְטְשַׁאצַּ֗ר <S%H1095><s%> be-le-te-shatz-Tzar, [the name] of Belteshazzar וְלַֽחֲנַנְיָה֙ <S%H2608><s%> ve-la-cha-nan-Yah and to Hananiah שַׁדְרַ֔ךְ <S%H7714><s%> shad-Rach, of Shadrach וּלְמִֽישָׁאֵ֣ל <S%H4332><s%> u-le-mi-sha-'El and to Mishael מֵישַׁ֔ךְ <S%H4335><s%> mei-Shach, of Meshach וְלַעֲזַרְיָ֖ה <S%H5838><s%> ve-la-'a-zar-Yah and to Azariah עֲבֵ֥ד 'a-Ved נְגֽוֹ׃ <S%H5664><s%> ne-Go. of Abednego

וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem purposed דָּנִיֵּאל֙ <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-yeL But Daniel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bo, in his heart אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יִתְגָּאַ֛ל <S%H1351><s%> yit-ga-'Al that he would not defile בְּפַתְבַּ֥ג <S%H6598><s%> be-fat-Bag meat הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech of the king's וּבְיֵ֣ין <S%H3196><s%> u-ve-Yein nor with the wine מִשְׁתָּ֑יו <S%H4960><s%> mish-Tav; which he drank וַיְבַקֵּשׁ֙ <S%H1245><s%> vay-vak-Kesh therefore he requested מִשַּׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> mis-Sar of the prince הַסָּרִיסִ֔ים <S%H5631><s%> has-sa-ri-Sim, of the eunuchs אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יִתְגָּאָֽל׃ <S%H1351><s%> yit-ga-'Al. that he might not defile

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten had brought הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him Now God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דָּ֣נִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-Yel, Daniel לְחֶ֖סֶד <S%H2617><s%> le-Che-sed into favour וּֽלְרַחֲמִ֑ים <S%H7356><s%> u-le-ra-cha-Mim; and tender love לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei with שַׂ֥ר <S%H8269><s%> sar the prince הַסָּרִיסִֽים׃ <S%H5631><s%> has-sa-ri-Sim. of the eunuchs

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said שַׂ֤ר <S%H8269><s%> sar And the prince הַסָּרִיסִים֙ <S%H5631><s%> has-sa-ri-Sim of the eunuchs לְדָ֣נִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1840><s%> le-Da-ni-Yel, unto Daniel יָרֵ֤א <S%H3373><s%> ya-Re I fear אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni my lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, the king אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who מִנָּ֔ה <S%H4487><s%> min-Nah, who hath appointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַאֲכַלְכֶ֖ם <S%H3978><s%> ma-'a-chal-Chem your meat וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִשְׁתֵּיכֶ֑ם <S%H4960><s%> mish-tei-Chem; and your drink אֲשֶׁ֡ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לָמָּה֩ <S%H4100><s%> lam-Mah why יִרְאֶ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> yir-'Eh for why should he see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פְּנֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H6440><s%> pe-nei-Chem your faces זֹֽעֲפִ֗ים <S%H2196><s%> zo-'a-Fim, worse liking מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- more הַיְלָדִים֙ <S%H3206><s%> hay-la-Dim than the children אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who כְּגִֽילְכֶ֔ם <S%H1524><s%> ke-gi-le-Chem, exceedingly וְחִיַּבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H2325><s%> ve-chi-yav-Tem endanger אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֹאשִׁ֖י <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shi my head לַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> lam-Me-lech. to the king

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said דָּנִיֵּ֖אל <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-Yel Daniel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמֶּלְצַ֑ר <S%H4453><s%> ham-mel-Tzar; to Melzar אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom מִנָּה֙ <S%H4487><s%> min-Nah had set שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> sar whom the prince הַסָּֽרִיסִ֔ים <S%H5631><s%> has-sa-ri-Sim, of the eunuchs עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over דָּנִיֵּ֣אל <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-Yel over Daniel חֲנַנְיָ֔ה <S%H2608><s%> cha-nan-Yah, Hananiah מִֽישָׁאֵ֖ל <S%H4332><s%> mi-sha-'El Mishael וַעֲזַרְיָֽה׃ <S%H5838><s%> va-'a-zar-Yah. and Azariah

נַס־ <S%H5254><s%> nas- Prove נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> na Please אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha thy servants יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days עֲשָׂרָ֑ה <S%H6235><s%> 'a-sa-Rah; I beseech thee ten וְיִתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> ve-yit-te-nu- and let them give לָ֜נוּ La-nu מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- some הַזֵּרֹעִ֛ים <S%H2235><s%> haz-ze-ro-'Im us pulse וְנֹאכְלָ֖ה <S%H398><s%> ve-no-che-Lah to eat וּמַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> u-Ma-yim and water וְנִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <S%H8354><s%> ve-nish-Teh. to drink

וְיֵרָא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> ve-ye-ra-'U be looked upon לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha before מַרְאֵ֔ינוּ <S%H4758><s%> mar-'Ei-nu, Then let our countenances וּמַרְאֵה֙ <S%H4758><s%> u-mar-'Eh thee and the countenance הַיְלָדִ֔ים <S%H3206><s%> hay-la-Dim, of the children הָאֹ֣כְלִ֔ים <S%H398><s%> ha-'O-che-Lim, that eat אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et פַּתְבַּ֣ג <S%H6598><s%> pat-Bag meat הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech; of the king's וְכַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ve-cha-'a-Sher who תִּרְאֵ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> tir-'Eh, and as thou seest עֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Seh deal עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with עֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha. with thy servants

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' So he consented לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> lad-da-Var to them in this matter הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; this וַיְנַסֵּ֖ם <S%H5254><s%> vay-nas-Sem and proved יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days עֲשָׂרָֽה׃ <S%H6235><s%> 'a-sa-Rah. them ten

וּמִקְצָת֙ <S%H7117><s%> u-mik-Tzat And at the end יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days עֲשָׂרָ֔ה <S%H6235><s%> 'a-sa-Rah, of ten נִרְאָ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> nir-'Ah appeared מַרְאֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4758><s%> mar-'ei-Hem their countenances ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov, fairer וּבְרִיאֵ֖י <S%H1277><s%> u-ve-ri-'Ei and fatter בָּשָׂ֑ר <S%H1320><s%> ba-Sar; in flesh מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- than כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיְלָדִ֔ים <S%H3206><s%> hay-la-Dim, than all the children הָאֹ֣כְלִ֔ים <S%H398><s%> ha-'O-che-Lim, which did eat אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et פַּתְבַּ֥ג <S%H6598><s%> pat-Bag meat הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech. of the king's
